comments:
Build: I-20040330

This is a spinoff of bug 53561

Launch Eclipse on a fresh workspace.

Close intro and the resource perspective.

Ctrl-N to bring up the new Project wizard.

Create a Hello world plug-in project.  Press Finish.

You will be asked if you want to switch to the PDE perspective.  Say yes.  The 
operation will finish, but still no perspectives are open.

Upon exiting in this state, you get the following NPE in the log:

!SESSION Apr 02, 2004 01:45:14.594 --------------------------------------------
-
java.version=1.4.2
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US

Marking as a dup of a more recent bug.  Bug 57280 has a much easier test case.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 57280 ***
